title: ‘Acute financial crisis’: Future Retail says scaling down ops to cut losses amid legal dispute with Amazon - Mint
content: ‘Acute financial crisis’: Future Retail says scaling down ops to cut losses amid legal dispute with Amazon  Mint
description: Future Retail says the company has made a loss of  ₹4,445 crore in the last four quarters.The company says the ongoing litigation initiated by Amazon in October 2020 has created “serious impediments”
